meta.title: Services - Eye On Idea
meta.description: Professional website packages, visual identity, CMS solutions, and ongoing support. Tailored digital solutions for B2B companies across Europe.

hero.title: Digital Solutions That Grow With You
hero.subtitle: Eye On Idea helps companies establish and grow a clear, professional digital presence. All projects are scoped individually, based on real needs - not templates.

packages.title: Choose Your Foundation
packages.subtitle: Professional websites tailored to your business stage and needs

launch.name: Launch
launch.description: A professional website that gives your company a credible, trustworthy presence from day one.
launch.idealFor: New companies, solo founders, or businesses establishing their online presence.

growth.name: Growth
growth.description: A flexible website designed to support content, updates, and visibility as your business grows.
growth.idealFor: Companies that actively update content and want a website that evolves with the business.

platform.name: Platform
platform.description: A long-term digital platform built to support structured content, multiple audiences, and future growth.
platform.idealFor: Companies viewing their website as a core business tool rather than a static presentation.

packages.pricingNote: All prices excl. VAT. Final pricing depends on scope and requirements.

identity.title: Brand Your Digital Presence
identity.description: A coherent visual foundation that gives your company a recognizable and professional appearance. Focused on web-relevant branding with options to extend into print.

cms.title: Manage Content Independently
cms.description: Eye On Idea delivers custom CMS solutions using Sanity, enabling clients to manage content independently without technical complexity.

features.description: Scalable content models adapted to your business needs

features.title: Editor-Friendly

features.title: Content Separation

features.title: Flexible Integration
features.description: Standalone service or included in website projects

support.title: Ongoing Partnership
support.subtitle: A website is not a one-time product. It's a living part of your business.

growth.name: Growth
